function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to education and healthcare","Impact":"High risk of disease propagation and reduced population health","Mitigation":"Investment in education and healthcare infrastructure, community health programs","Technologies":"Telemedicine, e-learning platforms, remote healthcare monitoring","People":"Underprivileged communities, disadvantaged populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, NGOs"},{"Description":"Inequality and exclusion of individuals","Impact":"Increased risk of community transmission of diseases, social unrest","Mitigation":"Promotion of fair relationships, economic redistribution, social inclusion programs","Technologies":"Digital financial services, community empowerment platforms","People":"Marginalized groups, disadvantaged communities","Owner":"Government, community organizations, social enterprises"},{"Description":"Lack of integration between public health and sustainable development","Impact":"Diminished long-term public health outcomes, environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Incorporation of public health in sustainable development initiatives, environmental stewardship","Technologies":"Health impact assessment tools, environmental monitoring and management systems","People":"General public, policymakers, environmental organizations","Owner":"Public health agencies, environmental agencies, government"}]}
